text.section:
Each hospital that provides obstetrical services shall establish a universal newborn hearing screening program to ensure that:
All newborns born in the hospital are screened for hearing loss before discharge; and
The results are reported as required under § 13-605 of this article.

The universal newborn hearing screening program established under this section shall consist of at least one of the following screening tests:
Auditory brain stem response;
Otoacoustic emissions; or
Another appropriate screening test recommended by the Advisory Council and approved by the Secretary.
